New Records: Jalen Green scored 33 points for the Houston Rockets.
Amen Thompson recorded 23 points and 16 rebounds.
Fred VanVleet scored 15 points and made key defensive plays.
LeBron James scored 21 points with 13 rebounds and 9 assists for the Los Angeles Lakers.
Anthony Davis scored 22 of his 30 points in the second half.
Key Match Events: The Rockets pulled away in the fourth quarter after a 10-0 run.
Fred VanVleet made a critical steal and two free throws to secure the win.
The Lakers struggled to overcome a 22-point deficit in the first half.
